data.title: Erica's Marriages Multiple Choice Quiz
data.meta_description: Test your memory on all of Ericas marriages right here! Good luck! All air dates are American. - test your knowledge in this quiz! (Author CAGuy0206)
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. Erica and Jeff married after they crossed over the state line.

Answer: True

Erica was involved with Jeff Martin when she first got to town and he enjoyed her company. The two wed when they departed town and crossed over the state line to exchange vows at a Justice of the Peace. However, Erica soon grew bored being a doctor's wife and their marriage, like many of Erica's, was short lived.

2. Phil married Erica. However, he still had feelings for which woman throughout their marriage?

Answer: Tara Brent

Phil started to distance himself from Tara when he got back from serving in the Vietnam War. Erica, who always pined for him, snatched Phil up and they got married. However, Phil could not stop thinking about Tara throughout his primarily unhappy marriage with Erica. The duo divorced shortly after exchanging their vows.

3. Who did Erica blame for causing her marriage to Tom to end?

Answer: Brooke English

Erica fell for Tom Cudahy and the two wed but she constantly went behind his back. First, Erica made business decisions about the Goalpost without Tom's approval and then she lied to him about wanting a baby. Throughout their union, Tom also befriended Brooke. Erica felt that Brooke was the reason behind their marriage ending but Brooke shot back that Erica only had herself to blame for Tom leaving her.

4. Erica got with Adam after they had a business relationship. Adam was making a film about Erica's autobiography. What was the name of it?

Answer: Raising Kane

Adam came to town as a film producer with his sights set on bringing Erica's bestselling autobiography, "Raising Kane", to life. The two eventually fell in love with each other and exchanged vows. However, Adam soon drove Erica nuts so she decided to leave him for good during the mid 1980s.

5. While Erica was married to Adam, she also developed feelings for which man?

Answer: Mike Roy

Erica and Mike had a solid friendship since he agreed to ghostwrite her autobiography. As Erica was with Adam, this upset Mike since he cultivated a romantic flare for Erica. In the meantime, Erica also dreamed about Mike constantly while with Adam. When Adam "died" (in actuality he faked his death), Erica and Mike embarked on a whirlwind courtship.

6. Travis came to town and wooed Erica. At that time, he owned a team from which sport?

Answer: Basketball

Handsome, dashing Travis Montgomery arrived in Pine Valley ready to run for public office. He also became entranced by the seductive Erica Kane and they had a romantic fling together. During their time together, including marriage, Travis owned a basketball team that propelled his wealthy status.

7. Which woman came between Travis and Erica during her marriage?

Answer: Barbara Montgomery

When Travis came to town, Barbara followed him there since she wanted him back. Travis made it clear to Barbara how he loved Erica. However, throughout their marriage, Barbara proved to be a major pain since she kept fighting Erica for Travis's affections. After Travis and Erica's two marriages dissolved, he remarried Barbara.

8. At Erica's first wedding to Dimitri, Kendall and Bianca both served as Maids of Honor.

Answer: True

Erica and Dimitri planned to wed in a Russian Orthodox wedding. Beforehand, there was friction between Bianca and Kendall since Bianca disliked having Kendall involved with the nuptials. Erica however sat her down and explained that Kendall would be a Maid of Honor just like her and that was her final decision.

9. During Erica's second marriage to Dimitri, he served her with divorce papers on what holiday?

Answer: New Year's

Dimitri and Erica's second marriage was tainted primarily by Erica's destructive behavior over her drug addiction. After several attempts to get Erica to come to terms with her problem, he had enough. On New Year's of 1996, Dimitri had Erica served with divorce papers and they officially divorced a short while later.

10. Jack ended his marriage to Erica after she developed feelings for which man?

Answer: Jeff Martin

Jack and Erica finally married after years of being together so they were ready for a long, eventful marriage. However, things turned sour after Jeff Martin returned to town and Erica started to fall for him. Several months later, Jack and Erica agreed to divorce and go their separate ways.

Source: Author CAGuy0206

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor Gamemaster1967 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
